sen.j: グンゼ博物苑（はくぶつえん）とは、京都府綾部市青野町にある博物館である。
sen.e: Gunze museum is a museum located in Aono Town, Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Gunze museum is a museum located in Aono Town, Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Gunze Museum is a museum located in Aono Town, Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Overview
Overview
Summary

sen.j: 綾部市にて1896年に創立されたグンゼが創立100周年にあたる1996年、設立した。
sen.e: The museum was opened in 1996 by Gunze limited commemorating the 100th anniversary of the company, which was founded in Ayabe City in 1896.
The museum was opened in 1996 by Gunze, Limited, commemorating the 100th anniversary of the company, which was founded in Ayabe City in 1896.
The museum was opened in 1996 by Gunze Limited, commemorating the 100th anniversary of the company, which was founded in Ayabe City in 1896.
sen.cmt: Gunze, Limited のカンマを削除しました。

sen.e: Facilities
Facilities
Facilities
Warehouse square
Warehouse square
Warehouse square

sen.j: メリヤスや靴下、絹製品などについての博物館や、広場などがある。
sen.e: Facilities, such as a museum on knit goods, socks, silk goods, etc., and open squares are provided.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Facilities, such as a museum on knit goods, socks, silk goods, etc., and open squares are provided.
Facilities, such as a museum on knit goods, socks, silk goods, etc., and open squares are provided.

sen.j: 博物館は、大正時代初期に建てられた旧郡是製糸繭蔵を使用している。
sen.e: The museum is housed in an old building, which was used as a Gunze-seishi cocoon warehouse, built in the early Taisho period.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The museum is housed in an old building, which was used as a Gunze-seishi cocoon warehouse, built in the early Taisho period.
The museum is housed in an old building, which was used as a Gunze-seishi cocoon warehouse, built in the early Taisho period.
Mulberry park
Mulberry park
Mulberry park

sen.j: 桑は、蚕を育てる上で重要な植物である。
sen.e: Mulberry is an important plant to grow silkworms.
Mulberry is an important plant for growing silkworms.
Mulberry is an important plant for growing silkworms.

sen.j: そんな桑が500品種、2000本植えられている。
sen.e: A total of 2000 trees of such mulberry (500 races) are planted in the park.
A total of 2000 trees of such mulberry (500 races) are planted in the park.
A total of 2000 trees of such mulberry (500 varieties) are planted in the park.
sen.cmt: races→varieties として修正しました。

sen.e: Gunze memorial hall
Gunze memorial hall
Gunze Memorial Hall

sen.j: 創業時の業務であり、何鹿郡時代の主要産業であった蚕糸業についてや、グンゼの歴史についての記念館。
sen.e: It is a memorial hall on the history of Gunze and silk yarn production, which was the major industry in the Ikaruga-gun period and was also the business field of the company when it was founded.
It is a memorial hall on the history of Gunze and silk yarn production, which was the major industry in the Ikaruga-gun period and was also the business field of the company when it was founded.
It is a memorial hall on the history of Gunze and silk yarn production, which was the major industry in the Ikaruga-gun period and was also the business field of the company when it was founded.

sen.j: もともとは本社事務所として使われていた。
sen.e: The building of the hall was originally used as the headquarters of the company.
The building of the hall was originally used as the headquarters of the company.
The building of the hall was originally used as the headquarters of the company.
Access
Access
Access

sen.j: 最寄駅は、西日本旅客鉄道 山陰本線 綾部駅。
sen.e: The nearest station is Ayabe Station of the JR Sanin Main Line.
The nearest station is Ayabe Station of the JR Sanin Main Line.
The nearest station is Ayabe Station on the Sanin Main Line of JR West.
sen.cmt: 西日本旅客鉄道: JR West を加えて修正しました。

sen.j: 最寄のインターチェンジは舞鶴若狭自動車道 綾部インターチェンジ。
sen.e: The nearest interchange is Ayabe interchange of the Maizuru-wakasa express way.
The nearest interchange is Ayabe interchange of the Maizuru-wakasa expressway.
The nearest interchange is Ayabe interchange of the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
